lyric:
[by:大雷娃]
[00:26.26]It's been a long day without you my friend
[00:33.19]And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[00:39.30]We've come a long way from where we began
[00:45.68]Oh I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[00:51.97]When I see you again
[02:17.87]It's been a long day without you my friend
[02:24.77]And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[02:30.89]We've come a long way from where we began
[02:37.01]Oh I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[02:43.44]When I see you again
tlyric:
[by:权依一]
[00:26.26]我的朋友 许久未见
[00:33.19]我将诉以衷肠 若还能再见
[00:39.30]不知不觉 已出发甚远
[00:45.68]我将诉以衷肠 若还能再见
[00:51.97]若还能再见
